name: Chu~Kana Janshi
synopsis: Play mahjong against cute and colorful characters designed by popular manga artist Kenichi Sonoda (known for his work on Bubblegum Crisis, Gall Force, Gunsmith Cats, and Riding Bean). There's a total of 10 opponents in the game. The settings featured in the game include the Meiji era of Japan, the Orient, and even the Wild West.
